text: Steven James Brody (May 22, 1970 â€“ February 22, 2019), known professionally as Brody Stevens, was an American stand-up comedian and actor. He was known for his roles in the television series Brody Stevens: Enjoy It!, and was known for appearances on Chelsea Lately. He starred in The Hangover (2009) and Due Date (2010). On February 22, 2019, Stevens was found dead in his Los Angeles after hanging himself, aged 48. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Suicides by hanging in the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Comedians from Los Angeles
title: Brody Stevens
